def minimum_connectivity_cost(N, rectangles):
    INF = 10 * 18
    from heapq import heappush, heappop
    (l0, r0) = rectangles[0]
    L = [-l0 + 1]
    R = [l0 - 1]
    s = t = 0
    res = 0
    for i in range(N - 1):
        (l0, r0) = rectangles[i]
        (l1, r1) = rectangles[i + 1]
        s += r1 - l1
        t += r0 - l0
        if -s - L[0] <= l1 - 1 <= t + R[0]:
            heappush(L, -l1 + 1 - s)
            heappush(R, l1 - 1 - t)
        elif l1 - 1 < -s - L[0]:
            heappush(L, -l1 + 1 - s)
            heappush(L, -l1 + 1 - s)
            p = -heappop(L) - s
            heappush(R, p - t)
            res += p - (l1 - 1)
        elif t + R[0] < l1 - 1:
            heappush(R, l1 - 1 - t)
            heappush(R, l1 - 1 - t)
            p = heappop(R) + t
            heappush(L, -p - s)
            res += l1 - 1 - p
    return res
